name: Idealinput
tag_list: marketing, expert, feedback, branding, advertising, logo, ads, website, advertisement, consulting, reviews, review, critique
overview:
Idealinput helps entrepreneurs and small and medium businesses get better marketing.

Idealinput is a online and cost effective marketing, advertising and branding consulting service for small businesses.

Businesses send their marketing materials (can be a website, logo, ad, poster, radio spot, video,…) to Idealinput and then the marketing material is send to two marketing, branding and advertising experts. The experts will provide a review of the marketing material saying what they think about it, what is good and how the business can improve it. In other words, the expert gives the client the information he needs to improve his marketing - which has a lots of benefits.

Businesses can also choose to publish publicly their marketing material on Idealinput.com so anyone on the web can give their feedback.
